text: I am continuing my passion for programming after transfering from community college to a University. At Sacramento State University, California I will complete my bachelors degree.

An intensive 24-week long boot camp dedicated to designing and building web applications. Skills learned consisted of HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handlebars JS, & React Js.
I found my passion for programming in 2017 at community college. At American River College I have completed all lower division courses for C++ programming.
